Article Title: Lionel Messi GOAT India Tour goes wrong! CM Devendra Fadnavis, Ajay Devgn and Tiger Shroff booed by crowd - Watch
Article Text:
Argentine football icon Lionel Messi, left, Maharashtra Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis, second left, Bollywood actor Tiger Shroff, right, in Mumbai (@CMOMaharashtra/X via PTI Photo)

Fans throw objects, vandalise stadium after Messi leaves early | Hyderabad next

NEW DELHI: A tense moment unfolded at Mumbai's Wankhede Stadium when Bollywood actors Ajay Devgn and Tiger Shroff faced booing from the crowd during Lionel Messi's event on Sunday. The incident took place during their felicitation by Maharashtra Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis.The event was part of Messi's GOAT India Tour 2025, with Mumbai being the third destination following shows in Kolkata and Hyderabad on Saturday. However, amid the excitement of seeing Messi up close, the crowd's displeasure became evident during the recognition ceremony.It looked as if many spectators wanted to see only Messi rather than celebrity appearances.Tiger Shroff, introduced as a "youth icon" and "India's youngest action star", represented the Maharashtra government's initiative, Project Mahadeva. This initiative aims to develop young football talent across Maharashtra.Ajay Devgn's introduction focused on his disciplined work ethic and his connection to football through his film Maidaan, which tells the story of coach Syed Abdul Rahim.Nevertheless, as both movie stars entered the pitch, their entries were met with loud boos from sections of fans.Watch:The crowd did not spare Maharashtra Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis. As he addressed the gathering, his remarks were again met with loud boos from sections of the audience.The mood briefly shifted when the CM invoked ‚ÄúGanpati Bappa,‚Äù prompting chants of ‚ÄúMorya‚Äù from the crowd that drowned out the jeers and created an interesting scene at the venue.Messi remained professional throughout the uncomfortable situation. He greeted everyone with a smile and stood quietly as the crowd expressed their displeasure.The event improved when cricket legend Sachin Tendulkar met Messi for a special interaction. They exchanged gifts, with Tendulkar giving a Team India jersey and Messi offering a football, which received enthusiastic applause.The celebration included a patriotic display as Messi held the Indian flag. His teammates Luis Su√°rez and Rodrigo De Paul carried their national flags of Uruguay and Argentina, respectively.Messi and his Inter Miami teammates Luis Su√°rez and Rodrigo De Paul are scheduled to continue their tour in Delhi on Monday.
Article Summary: Bollywood actors ajay devgn and tiger shroff faced booing from the crowd during lionel messi's event. The incident took place during their felicitation by maharashtra chief minister devendra fadnavis. The event was part of messi's goat india tour 2025, with mumbai being the third destination.

Article Title: ‚ÄúI‚Äôm gonna miss him‚Äù ‚Äì Dwyane Wade gets emotional in heartfelt tribute as LeBron James‚Äô historic NBA career draws praise
Article Text:
Dwyane Wade & LeBron James. Image via: Imagn Images

Dwyane Wade reflects on LeBron James in Year 23





Dwyane Wade and LeBron James memories from the Heat era





The bond between Dwyane Wade and LeBron James has always been special. As James steps into Year 23, Wade no longer speaks as a former teammate alone. He speaks as a fan who understands what the league is slowly preparing to lose. Recently, Wade commented on James‚Äô 23rd NBA season comes contemplating who shared championships, pressure, and history with James at the highest level.Wade‚Äôs words arrive at a time when every appearance by LeBron feels meaningful. The milestones keep coming, yet the uncertainty lingers. For Wade, that reality has shifted how he watches the game now. There is admiration, reflection, and a sense of time closing in on an era few believed possible.Speaking candidly, Dwyane Wade did not hide the emotion tied to watching James still perform at an elite level. His appreciation felt personal and honest.‚ÄúI‚Äôm like you guys, I‚Äôm a fan. I know it‚Äôs like, ‚Äòhe‚Äôs old, he should retire‚Äô. But at the same time, I‚Äôm gonna miss him‚Ä¶ He‚Äôs just taking these moments in, we don‚Äôt know when the last one is coming.‚ÄùWade‚Äôs praise for James is not a one time thing. Previously, in episode of Wy Network by Dwyane Wade, the Heat legend shared his candid thoughts.‚ÄúI have the greatest body of work of anybody that‚Äôs ever put a Miami Heat jersey on,‚Äù Wade said.‚ÄúIf you wanna be honest, LeBron James is the greatest player to ever put a Miami Heat jersey on‚Ä¶ I‚Äôm the greatest player in the history of the Miami Heat for the body of work I had wearing that jersey, but I‚Äôm not the greatest player to ever put on a Miami Heat jersey.‚ÄùDwyane Wade retired from the NBA in 2019 after 16 seasons, mostly with the Miami Heat. He admitted his burst was fading and the joy was gone, even as a Hall of Famer. Since retiring, Wade thrives as a businessman, media voice, and NBA owner, while proudly supporting his daughter Zaya.Wade recently revisited another iconic chapter with humor while recalling the famous Big Three introduction. His memory of that moment revealed both restraint and foresight.‚ÄúLet‚Äôs run that tape who was it again. It‚Äôs one voice and look at the one in the middle laughing like young boy over here was talking‚Ä¶ he was feeling the moment‚Ä¶ look I look put my head down, look I put my head down, ‚ÄòI‚Äôm like hey man look now I‚Äômma supportive teammate.'‚Äù‚ÄúI‚Äôm my rubbing my knee I‚Äôm like ‚ÄòOh I don‚Äôt know if I got that much‚Ä¶ He trippin‚Äô, look I ain‚Äôt said a word‚Ä¶ That was that supposed to have been a moment that was just for our fans and it should not have been the world should not have seen.‚Äù‚ÄúThat‚Äôs something that you say internal, you know what I mean? We going to win every year but really you know how hard it is to win one year. I don‚Äôt care what kind of talent you have so that‚Äôs why I was sitting there like oh my man don‚Äôt know yet.‚Äù‚ÄúBut he did go to the Finals 10 years in a row though. He damn sure didn‚Äôt like about how many opportunities. He almost did it, he ain‚Äôt lie‚Ä¶ Listen, we went 4, he went 10.‚ÄùIn September this year, the 2025 Basketball Hall of Fame weekend carried special meaning for LeBron James and Dwyane Wade. While Wade was inducted in 2023 and James awaits retirement, both attended to honor the 2008 Team USA ‚ÄúRedeem Team.‚Äù The group‚Äôs induction marked a defining chapter in USA Basketball history.LeBron James is not stopping despite recent injury setbacks. The King got back on his feet and made a strong comeback. So far, he has not shared any update on his retirement.Also Read: "The Kings are here": LeBron James & Jay-Z's courtside moment sends NBA fans into meltdown
Article Summary: Dwyane wade retired from the nba in 2019 after 16 seasons, mostly with the miami heat. He admitted his burst was fading and the joy was gone, even as a hall of famer. Since retiring, wade thrives as a businessman, media voice, and nba owner. So far, he has not shared any update on his retirement.

Article Title: List of all celebrities and tv personalities who attended the Chiefs game against Chargers
Article Text:
List of all celebrities and tv personalities who attended the Chiefs game against Chargers (Getty Images)

Who attended the Chiefs vs Chargers game in NFL week 15?



It was a must-win game for Kansas City Chiefs against the Los Angeles Chargers to keep the playoff hopes alive. But at the end of the day, it was Justin Herbert's team that made sure that Patrick Mahomes' team misses the NFL playoff picture after 11 years, something the Chiefs are not used to.Many celebrities from Chiefs side came to cheer for the team but it all went in vain. A star-studded stand also could not help Travis Kelce and co from a defeat that would surely take some time to digest. Chargers beat Chiefs by 16-13. Here's all the celebrities who attended the game.Taylor Swift does not need a spotlight to steal attention. Sometimes, the quietest presence says the most. On a cold night at Arrowhead Stadium, with playoff implications hanging in the air, Swift slipped back into a familiar setting. She was there for football, family and a moment that felt strikingly normal despite the global fame attached to her name.Swift was seen sharing a suite with Kylie Kelce and Jason Kelce‚Äôs young daughters, bundled up in a chunky gold, brown and orange jacket against the cold. In one clip, she gently lifted one of her soon to be nieces and held the child on her hip, smiling as the game played on. In another moment, her mother Andrea watched alongside Donna Kelce, turning the night into a rare snapshot of blended family time inside one of the NFL‚Äôs loudest venues.This low key approach has become a pattern. Just a week earlier, Swift attended the Chiefs game against the Houston Texans without drawing attention. She arrived unnoticed and barely appeared on the broadcast, a sharp contrast to previous seasons. Fans only realized she was there after spotting her in a suite with Selena Gomez and Lena Dunham, long after kickoff.There is intention behind the discretion. A source told Us Weekly in October that Swift chose to stay more out of sight because the attention had become ‚Äútoo excessive.‚Äù Since then, she has avoided being photographed arriving at Arrowhead Stadium, keeping the focus on the game rather than the gates.The night also included familiar Chiefs faces. Brittany Mahomes was present with son Bronze, wearing a custom white Mahomes Chiefs outfit while cheering from the stands. Though the season has been uneven, Brittany remained a style standout, from her symbolic denim looks to coordinated outfits with baby Golden. On this night, however, fashion took a back seat as she watched Patrick Mahomes endure a scary injury, a reminder that even glamorous game days can turn tense in seconds.At Arrowhead, the cameras missed the arrival, but they caught something better. A superstar blending into family, football and the cold Kansas City night.Also Read: Patrick Mahomes's wife Brittany's game-day fashion ages badly as Chiefs‚Äô disastrous defeat overshadows her attention-grabbing fit
Article Summary: Kansas city chiefs lost 16-13 to los angeles chargers in nfl week 15. Taylor swift, brittany mahomes and other celebrities attended the game. The loss means the chiefs will miss the nfl playoff picture for the first time in 11 years. Here are all the celebrities who attended the chiefs vs chargers game.

Article Title: NHL Update: Connor McDavid reacts after Edmonton Oilers trade Stuart Skinner and Brett Kulak
Article Text:
Stuart Skinner and Brett Kulak (Image Via Twitter)

How do Connor McDavid and Kris Knoblauch view Edmonton Oilers‚Äô Goaltending trade?

Edmonton Oilers Trade Skinner + Kulak For Jarry + Poulin Thoughts | Quinn Hughes To Wild

On Saturday, the Edmonton Oilers' locker room was filled with a combination of feelings and expectations as the team prepared for a huge roster change before their game against the Toronto Maple Leafs. The exchange that sent goalie Stuart Skinner and defenseman Brett Kulak to the Pittsburgh Penguins was a drastic change for a team that had trusted both players during their long playoff runs. The names of Connor McDavid , Kris Knoblauch, Tristan Jarry, and Spencer Stastney were soon among the top talks of Edmonton, looking ahead to the future.The move was meant to tackle the goalkeeping issues, but the human aspect of the decision could not be overlooked. Skinner had been with the Oilers for parts of six seasons and had helped the team reach the Stanley Cup Finals twice in a row. Kulak was also a dependable player on the defense. After the morning skate, McDavid talked about how hard the moment was, and he made it clear that the loss of the familiar faces weighed on the team, even as they were getting ready for a new chapter.McDavid called the trade a tough decision that the team had to make, and at the same time pointed to the positive side of the situation by saying how much the group would miss Skinner and Kulak.Head Coach Kris Knoblauch was equally supportive, stating that both players had been very dependable over the years, contributing not only on but also off the ice. Another ex-Oilers defenseman, Troy Stecher, who now plays for Toronto, offered his insight into the situation, too. He referred to the trade as part of the business and wished his ex-colleagues nothing but the best in their new home, Pittsburgh.The focus was then directed towards the newly recruited players. Knoblauch showed trust in Tristan Jarry and mentioned his experience and the good results he had in the past, despite a hard previous season. Jarry, who got the call against Toronto, shared that the last day and a half had been full of emotions but added that getting to play with superstars like McDavid and Leon Draisaitl was a thrill. At the same time, the rapid development of Spencer Stastney, who has been skating and moving the puck well, caught the coaching staff's attention, which believed that such a skill would bring the team more balance.The Oilers are taking change with a careful and optimistic attitude. The loss of reliable teammates is painful, but Edmonton is convinced that this kind of change will help the team to be better and thus to navigate through the season.Also Read: NHL Injury Update: Evgeni Malkin sidelined as Pittsburgh Penguins face playoff pressure
Article Summary: Edmonton oilers traded goalie stuart skinner and defenseman brett kulak to the pittsburgh penguins. Skinner had been with the oilers for parts of six seasons and had helped the team reach the stanley cup finals twice in a row. Connor mcdavid called the trade a tough decision that the team had to make, but pointed to the positive side of the situation.

Article Title: Tom Brady breaks silence with powerful message as John Cena steps into his final match
Article Text:
Tom Brady and John Cena (Image via: IG/X)

The NFL legend highlights John Cena‚Äôs influence beyond titles as his final match approaches

Tom Brady was not part of John Cena‚Äôs world, at least not on paper. Different sports, different crowds, different stages. Yet as Cena moves toward his final match, Brady‚Äôs words found their way into the moment, offering something quieter than praise and heavier than nostalgia.Retirements often arrive with long speeches and rehearsed emotion. This one felt different. Cena‚Äôs career has stretched across eras, pressure, and constant reinvention. Brady did not talk about wins or fame. He pointed to impact, to the people reached along the way, and to a kind of influence that stays after the lights dim.Brady‚Äôs tribute did not try to sum up Cena‚Äôs career. It did not need to. The message stayed focused on something deeper than records, something harder to measure. Impact. The kind that reaches people who never step into the ring but still feel connected to what happens there.‚ÄúHey John, Congratulations on an incredible career. You have impacted lives, so many people inside the rain and outside the rain. Good luck in your last match.‚ÄùThe line stood out because Brady knows how endings work. He has lived through them, stepped away, returned, and finally closed the door on his own terms.That perspective gives his words weight. By pointing to Cena‚Äôs influence both inside and outside the ring, Brady acknowledged the work that rarely gets attention. The discipline. The consistency.That kind of visibility carries weight. It asks more than performance. It demands consistency, patience, and restraint, year after year, even when the attention does not slow down.For Cena, influence was never limited to titles or scripted moments. Fans watched how he handled responsibility, how often he showed up for causes that mattered, and how he stayed accountable in public. Brady‚Äôs message reflected that side of the story. It hinted that success is not only about what you collect along the way, but about the people who feel seen because of you.As Cena approaches his final match, the exchange feels understated, not sentimental. Two long careers brushed past each other through mutual respect. No shared arena. No rivalry. Just an understanding shaped by pressure, longevity, and the cost of staying relevant for so long. The kind, that lasts long after the final bell rings. Some legacies never need an encore.Also read: Brittany Mahomes & Patrick Mahomes vs Travis Kelce & Taylor Swift combined Net Worth: Who truly reigns supreme?
Article Summary: The nfl legend highlights john cena‚Äôs influence beyond titles. Brady did not talk about wins or fame. He pointed to impact, to the people reached along the way. As cena approaches his final match, the exchange feels understated, not sentimental.

Article Title: Patrick's wife Brittany Mahomes‚Äô ‚Äòbest look yet‚Äô party moment hits as Chiefs sit 6-7 and the noise gets louder
Article Text:
Brittany Mahomes hosts a ‚ÄúChiefs girlies Christmas party‚Äù and draws strong fan reactions as Kansas City faces late-season pressure. (Image via Getty)

Brittany Mahomes turned the ‚ÄòChiefs girlies Christmas party‚Äô into a fashion headline

Patrick Mahomes got public backup, and Brittany Mahomes answered with 3 words

Brittany Mahomes turned her ‚ÄúChiefs girlies Christmas party‚Äù into the kind of Instagram moment that instantly got picked apart, praised, and reposted. She hosted the get-together this week for the Kansas City Chiefs‚Äô wives and girlfriends, then shared snapshots that put her white mini dress and oversized black bow front and center, per reporting from Yahoo (Madz Dizon) and Us Weekly (Grace Riley).The timing is part of why it popped. Kansas City is 6-7 after a loss to the Houston Texans, and the Chiefs are heading into a key stretch with the Los Angeles Chargers next on the schedule. While Patrick Mahomes keeps the football talk short, Brittany keeps showing up as the loudest off-field presence in his corner, and she is not shy about it.Brittany Mahomes, 30, posted her look ahead of hosting the ‚ÄúChiefs girlies Christmas party‚Äù on Instagram on Dec. 11, according to Us Weekly. The outfit was built around a fitted white minidress with a high neckline and cape sleeves, finished with a large black bow across the chest. She matched it with sheer black tights, pointed-toe heels with bows, diamond dangling earrings, and a black clutch decorated with crystals and pearls, per both outlets.The comments did the rest. Yahoo noted fans flooding her page with reactions like ‚ÄúThis is prob my fave look for you ever!‚Äù and ‚ÄúYour best look yet!! Stunning,‚Äù along with ‚ÄúYou look pretty as a present.‚ÄùUs Weekly added that Brittany later posted party gift bags and credited brands she partnered with, writing: ‚ÄúHosted the Chiefs girlies Christmas Party Tonight! ‚ú®üéÑ,‚Äù followed by: ‚ÄúThank you to the best partners for spoiling us!!! @whoop @hydrojug @boggbags @dolceglow @amazon @abercrombie @diviofficial. ‚ÄùShe did not confirm a full guest list. Us Weekly specifically noted she did not share which Chiefs WAGs attended, or whether Taylor Swift was there.Brittany‚Äôs party posts landed during a rough patch for Kansas City. One report framed it plainly: the Chiefs are 6-7 after the Texans loss, and they are running out of room to slip if they want to keep their postseason hopes alive.The same report also tied Brittany‚Äôs social moment to the bigger conversation around Patrick Mahomes, which has gotten louder with every loss. On the ‚ÄúUp & Adams‚Äù podcast, Kevin Durant pushed back hard on any legacy talk, saying: ‚ÄúWhat kind of a question is that? That makes no sense at all,‚Äù and adding, ‚ÄúIf anybody is questioning Pat Mahomes‚Äô legacy from a one-off year, he can miss the playoffs for the rest of his career, I don‚Äôt give a damn. This man is Patrick Mahomes.‚Äù Durant continued: ‚ÄúHow many championships does he have? Three? Come on now. Are we really going to question Pat Mahomes, Chris Jones, Travis Kelce? He‚Äôs still an all-time great, potentially the greatest of all time.‚ÄùBrittany saw the clip circulate and replied: ‚ÄúLet them know.‚Äù Mahomes also credited her in his weekly interview on 96.5 The Fan, saying: ‚ÄúHaving a great wife helps out a ton,‚Äù and ‚ÄúHer being able to handle the other extracurricular stuff I can‚Äôt be there for‚Ä¶ getting the family settled.‚Äù He also added: ‚ÄúI was able to spend Thanksgiving with them because we played on Thursday. That part was cool.‚ÄùIf Kansas City steadies itself against the Chargers, this week reads like a tidy headline. If the Chiefs stumble again, Brittany‚Äôs posts will keep getting treated like a side plot to the main drama: the league is watching Mahomes, and she is making it clear she is watching right back.
Article Summary: Brittany mahomes hosts a ‚Äòchiefs girlies christmas party‚Äô and draws strong fan reactions. She hosted the get-together this week for the kansas city chiefs‚Äô wives and girlfriends. The outfit was built around a fitted white minidress with a high neckline and cape sleeves.

Article Title: ‚ÄòEveryone is being a little dramatic‚Äô: What Joe Burrow‚Äôs ‚Äònot fun‚Äô comments really meant, inner circle explains
Article Text:
Joe Burrow addresses the media after another loss as Cincinnati sits at 4-9 amid playoff elimination pressure. (Image via Getty)

Dianna Russini‚Äôs reporting frames Joe Burrow‚Äôs mood as ‚ÄúI want to win,‚Äù not a goodbye

The Cincinnati Bengals‚Äô ‚Äúoperation‚Äù is still the problem behind the scenes

Joe Burrow sounded drained this week, and the clip got treated like a retirement teaser. It was not that, according to The Athletic‚Äôs Dianna Russini, who reported that people close to the Cincinnati Bengals quarterback saw the reaction as overblown.Russini‚Äôs reporting also pushed back on the two loudest leaps. One, that Burrow‚Äôs comments were rooted in mental health concerns. Two, that he was sending a trade warning shot. As of mid-December, Cincinnati is 4-9 and facing playoff elimination with a Week 15 game against the Baltimore Ravens, so the frustration is real. The exit-ramp theories are not, per Russini.Russini wrote that someone close to Burrow brushed off the concern when she brought up how down he sounded."Someone else close to Burrow said: 'Everyone is being a little dramatic. This isn‚Äôt mental health, this isn‚Äôt depression, this is I want to win,'" Russini wrote. "Teammates, coaches and people close to Burrow all say he just wants to play football, talk football and win football games."She also addressed the trade and stepping-away chatter directly."The answer is no. Burrow, I‚Äôm told, hasn‚Äôt asked for a trade or even hinted at stepping away," Russini wrote.That aligns with how Bengals Wire‚Äôs Chris Roling framed it on Dec. 13. Roling wrote that Burrow ‚Äúisn‚Äôt going anywhere,‚Äù and that the somber tone was more about being tired of losing than applying pressure for an exit.Russini‚Äôs reporting did not paint Burrow as thrilled with everything in the building, either. It narrowed the frustration to how the Bengals run parts of their football operation."Does that mean he‚Äôs thrilled with everything inside the Bengals‚Äô building? No. People close to him have made it clear that certain parts of the Bengals‚Äô operation, with the smallest coaching and scouting staffs in the league, have previously frustrated him."Roling‚Äôs Bengals Wire report made a similar point, separating Burrow‚Äôs mindset from a meltdown narrative. Roling wrote there is ‚Äúno frustration from Burrow with his offensive line,‚Äù calling it the best Burrow has had since entering the NFL, and instead aimed the heat at the team‚Äôs scouting and player personnel side. Roling described that group, led by Duke Tobin, as having ‚Äúcolossally failed over the years,‚Äù adding that things ‚Äúcame to a head‚Äù during Burrow‚Äôs injury stretch when Al Golden‚Äôs defense was described as tracking toward historically bad numbers.Here‚Äôs the clean read on what Russini and Roling are both signaling: Burrow‚Äôs message is not ‚Äúget me out.‚Äù It‚Äôs ‚Äústop wasting seasons.‚Äù With Cincinnati sitting at 4-9, the pressure is heading toward an offseason of changes anyway. Burrow can stay put and still force the organization to evolve, because losing does not get easier to tolerate just because the quarterback is loyal.
Article Summary: The athletic‚Äôs dianna russini reported that people close to the cincinnati bengals quarterback saw the reaction as overblown. The exit-ramp theories are not, per russini. As of mid-december, cincinnati is 4-9 and facing playoff elimination with a week 15 game against the ravens.

Article Title: WWE Saturday Night's Main Event: John Cena's final match, full match card, preview, date, start timings for all regions, how to watch, and more details
Article Text:
John Cena (Image Source: Getty)

Start times, how to watch, and global viewing information

What to expect from John Cena vs GUNTHER and other key storylines

WWE includes John Cena's farewell this weekend as we lead into Saturday Night's Main Event on Saturday, December 13, 2025, where Cena will have what WWE is promoting as his final in-ring match. The match with GUNTHER, which emerged from a build with GUNTHER via the booking of the "Last Time Is Now" tournament, is set to be a hard-hitting, technical exhibition aimed at giving Cena a big send-off while also pushing the opponent forward at the same time, at the same venue.The entire event is packed with multibrand showdowns and title ramifications, including Undisputed WWE Champion Cody Rhodes vs. NXT Champion Oba Femi, AJ Styles & Dragon Lee defending the World Tag Team Titles, and Bayley vs. Sol Ruca in a premier women‚Äôs division bout. WWE has carded the show as streaming live on Peacock in the US and regional broadcasts outside of the US.Saturday Night‚Äôs Main Event is scheduled to begin at 8:00 p.m. ET / 5:00 p.m. PT on December 13 in the U.S., exclusively on Peacock for American audiences. International fans can watch via WWE‚Äôs global distribution partners, including Sony Sports Network and SonyLIV in India, as well as WWE‚Äôs own channels in select regions.The 8:00 p.m. ET start converts to 1:00 a.m. GMT (UK, December 14), 6:30 a.m. IST (India, December 14), 11:00 a.m. AEST (Australia, December 14), and 10:00 a.m. JST (Japan, December 14). Viewers should check local listings for possible pre show programming or minor scheduling adjustments as WWE often updates timing for kickoff segments.Get ready for an evening with a nostalgic feel with a competitive edge. Cena can say farewell to the company where he spent the majority of his two-decade career, and GUNTHER's character has made it clear that he plans to ruin the moment by putting Cena through a long technical loss instead of the emotional moment we would all like to see. That dynamic creates the environment for either a heroic send-off for John Cena, or a conclusive changing of the guard from one of WWE's most successful 21st century stars.In the meantime, on that same card, Cody Rhodes takes on Oba Femi in a hypothetical champion versus champion match-up that could alter the course of two titles as we head into 2026. AJ Styles and Dragon Lee roll on as World Tag Team Champions, Bayley‚Äôs match with Sol Ruca highlights WWE Putting Bright New Talent Up Against Established Stars, and why veterans like Kevin Owens have a way of spelling it out on WWE Raw.With Cena‚Äôs final bell looming, Saturday Night‚Äôs Main Event is positioned to deliver both emotional weight and competitive drama across a packed card.Also Read: WWE pays heartfelt tribute to John Cena ahead of last match at Saturday Night Main Event
Article Summary: Saturday night's main event is scheduled to begin at 8:00 p.m. Et on december 13 in the u.s. exclusively on peacock for american audiences. International fans can watch via wwe‚Äôs global distribution partners, including sony sports network and sonyliv in india.

Article Title: Vanessa Bryant gets emotional as UConn Huskies and USC Trojans honor Kobe Bryant and Gigi in heartfelt on-court tribute
Article Text:
Images via Getty

Vanessa Bryant reposts athletes wearing Kobe gear during UConn Huskies and USC Trojans game

Image via Vanessa Bryant/Instagram (screengrab)

Connecticut Huskies defeat USC Trojans with a 28-point lead

Also Read

The UConn Huskies defeated the USC Trojans by a 28-point lead. But that is just one of the highlights from the game. The game left fans and even Vanessa Bryant emotional as both teams decided to honor the legacy of Kobe Bryant and Gigi Bryant. Players from both teams wore different editions of Kobe as they showcased their dunk skills in front of 9000 attendees.The gesture was one of a kind, as Vanessa personally reposted the pictures of the athletes wearing the Kobe gear on her Instagram story. On January 26, 2026, it will be exactly 6 years since Kobe and Gigi faced their unfortunate demise. However, their impact on basketball lives can still be felt. Especially after the gesture that both UConn and USC pulled off in their recent game.On December 13, the game between the UConn Huskies and the USC Trojans took an emotional turn. Players from both teams sent a tribute to the NBA legend Kobe Bryant and Gigi Bryant. Each one of them wore different pairs of Bryant‚Äôs signature sneakers. Apart from this, the teams revealed a rotation each. While the Huskies‚Äô rotation featured the Kobe 6 ‚ÄúStatue of Liberty,‚Äù the Kobe 5 ‚ÄúYear of the Snake‚Äù and the Kobe 3 ‚ÄúChristmas,‚Äù the Trojans‚Äô rotation featured the Kobe 4 ‚ÄúCHBL,‚Äù the Kobe 9 EM ‚ÄúMambacita‚Äù and the Kobe 9 Elite ‚ÄúMoonwalker.‚Äù Appreciating the effort by both teams, Vanessa Bryant shared the images of the athletes wearing the Kobe gear on her Instagram story.A post that went viral immediately featured the athletes and the rotation revealed by the teams. Vanessa made sure to share each one of the pictures that were included in the post. This was one of the most heartwarming gestures presented by any team in recent times. What made the gesture even more special was the possibility of the kind of position Gigi would have been in today if she were alive. Gigi expressed her desire to play for UConn. Had things been different, the young Bryant would now have been playing for the team.It was a high-profile match between the Connecticut Huskies and the USC Trojans. After four intense quarters, the Huskies emerged victorious with a 28-point lead. Azzi Fudd stole the limelight once again, racking up 17 points with 3 rebounds and 4 assists. Ashlynn Shade and Sarah Strong followed up, adding to the team‚Äôs victory with 15 and 14 points, respectively.
Article Summary: The uconn huskies defeated the usc trojans by a 28-point lead. The game left fans and even vanessa bryant emotional as both teams decided to honor the legacy of kobe bryant and gigi bryant. The gesture was one of a kind, as vanessa personally reposted the pictures of the athletes wearing the kobe gear.

Article Title: ‚ÄòTicky-tack‚Äô or fair? NFL fines T.J. Watt $11,593 as he recovers from lung surgery
Article Text:
Pittsburgh Steelers linebacker T.J. Watt warms up before a game earlier this season. Watt was fined $11,593 for a late hit against the Ravens days after undergoing surgery for a partially collapsed lung. (Image via Getty)

The NFL fined T.J. Watt, and the timing is brutal

Pittsburgh‚Äôs margin gets thinner without Watt

T.J. Watt just had a scary medical week. The Pittsburgh Steelers star also got hit in the wallet.The NFL fined Watt $11,593 for a late hit from Pittsburgh‚Äôs Week 14 win over the Baltimore Ravens, days after he underwent surgery to repair a partially collapsed lung suffered during a dry needling session at the team facility.The league issued Watt a $11,593 fine for a late hit on a play with 2:12 left in the second quarter against Baltimore, when he jumped onto a moving pile as the Ravens tried to finish a Derrick Henry run. Watt did not draw a flag on the play, but the NFL still fined him ahead of Week 15.Multiple reports noted it was Watt‚Äôs first fine of the season and the only fine handed out from the Steelers-Ravens game.The fine landed as Watt recovers from an injury that put him in the hospital for three days. His brother, J.J. Watt, confirmed the surgery and shared an update that included: "Yesterday TJ had successful surgery to stabilize and repair a partially collapsed lung suffered Wednesday after a dry needling treatment session at the facility," and "Recovery timeline is still TBD, but all went well and he is being released from the hospital today. "Watt‚Äôs wife, Dani Watt, also posted a statement after the procedure: ‚ÄúYesterday TJ completed successful surgery to stabilize and repair a partially collapsed lung suffered early Wednesday after a dry needling treatment session at the facility.It has been a very long hard couple of days but he will be home soon to recover,‚Äù she wrote. ‚ÄúThank you all for the incredible outpouring of love, prayers, and support the past couple of days. And praise God for the amazing medical teams at both hospitals! üôèüèº‚ù§Ô∏è‚ÄùOn the football side, Pittsburgh ruled Watt out for the Week 15 game against the Miami Dolphins on Monday Night Football, per head coach Mike Tomlin‚Äôs Friday update in the report you shared.This is where it stops being just ‚Äúnews‚Äù and starts being a problem for Pittsburgh.The Steelers still control their playoff destiny, with a slight lead in the AFC North and four games left in the regular season. But the schedule does not soften up: Dolphins, Detroit Lions, Cleveland Browns, and Ravens.And the stat that matters most is ugly. Pittsburgh is 1-11 all time without Watt on the field, per the dump you provided. If you‚Äôre looking for why this fine is already irritating Steelers fans, it‚Äôs because the team cannot afford distractions, missed snaps, or anything that turns into a story bigger than the next opponent.With Watt out, Pittsburgh‚Äôs edge rotation shifts fast. The Steelers are expected to lean on Alex Highsmith and Nick Herbig at outside linebacker, with Jack Sawyer working in. The piece you shared also noted DeMarvin Leal could be elevated from the practice squad as another option in the front.Meanwhile, the fine itself is already getting pushback in Steelers circles. Steelers Depot‚Äôs Joe Clark called it: ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs a really ticky-tack definition of a late hit, as Watt jumped on a pile of players trying to bring down Derrick Henry while the Ravens RB was still up,‚Äù and added: ‚ÄúIt really doesn‚Äôt look like a play that rose to a level of a fine.‚ÄùThe Steelers can complain. They can laugh it off. None of that helps if Watt misses more than one week. If he comes back quickly, this becomes a weird footnote in an already wild week. If he does not, Pittsburgh‚Äôs biggest ‚Äúmust-have‚Äù piece turns into a weekly question, and that is how seasons slip.
Article Summary: Pittsburgh steelers linebacker t.j. watt was fined $11,593 for a late hit against the ravens days after undergoing surgery for a partially collapsed lung. The fine landed as watt recovers from an injury that put him in the hospital for three days. Pittsburgh ruled watt out for the week 15 game against the miami dolphins.

Article Title: Smiles, photos, and football: Hyderabad sets things right for Lionel Messi after Kolkata mess; GOAT India Tour back on track
Article Text:
Argentine footballer and 2022 FIFA World Cup winning captain Lionel Messi, his Inter Miami teammates Rodrigo De Paul, and Luis Suarez during the second leg of 'GOAT India Tour 2025', in Hyderabad. (Left), and Lionel Messi playing football (Photo/Agencies)

Fans throw objects, vandalise stadium after Messi leaves early | Hyderabad next

Also read:

NEW DELHI: Lionel Messi‚Äôs programme in Hyderabad on Saturday offered a clear contrast to the disorder seen earlier in Kolkata, as the second leg of the GOAT India Tour passed without disruption and ended on a smooth note.After a troubled start in the City of Joy, Hyderabad offered a setting where the event was allowed to breathe. The structure held, the crowd stayed in place, and the programme ran as intended, drawing a clear line between what had gone wrong earlier in the day and what was put right later.Messi arrived in Hyderabad at around 5.40 pm, following a difficult opening leg of his three-day, four-city GOAT India Tour 2025. Telangana chief minister A Revanth Reddy received him at the Taj Falaknuma Palace before the Argentine headed to the Rajiv Gandhi International Stadium.The stands were close to full when Messi walked out, dressed simply in a green crew-neck T-shirt, black trousers and sports shoes. This time, there was no rush, no scramble. He stayed for about an hour, at ease, moving through the programme without the strain that had cut short his time in Kolkata.‚ÄúI am very happy to be in Hyderabad in the midst of all the love and affection shown by you all,‚Äù Messi said through a translator, acknowledging the crowd.Messi, along with Inter Miami teammates Luis Suarez and Rodrigo De Paul, took part in the GOAT Cup penalty shootout, with Revanth Reddy also joining them on the field in football attire. The players later conducted football clinics for children before the formalities drew to a close.Senior Congress leader Rahul Gandhi joined the group towards the end of the event during the felicitation ceremony, with photographs taken in front of the sponsor hoardings lining the ground.Messi presented the GOAT Cup to Singareni RR 9, winners of the seven-a-side exhibition match and a team representing the chief minister. Reddy presented a memento to Messi, while Gandhi handed one to Suarez.Before stepping onto the field, Messi spent time inside the stadium, looking at photographs on the walls and speaking with officials. He waved to fans from behind a glass barrier, then later offered glimpses of the touch and control that have defined his career, juggling and passing the ball with Suarez, De Paul and Reddy. A slow walk around the stadium followed, with Messi acknowledging the crowd along the way.Earlier in the day, scenes in Kolkata were very different. Around 50,000 spectators, many of whom paid between Rs 4,000 and Rs 12,000 ‚Äî and in some cases up to Rs 20,000 in the black market ‚Äî were left angry as politicians, VVIPs and security personnel surrounded Messi, limiting visibility for fans.The situation escalated when spectators threw bottles, which are banned inside stadiums. Food packets were also found inside the venue. Chairs were pulled out and thrown, and fibreglass seats were damaged across the field and the synthetic track.Messi will travel to Mumbai on Sunday for the third leg of the GOAT India Tour 2025. He will conclude his visit on Monday in New Delhi, where he is scheduled to meet Prime Minister Narendra Modi.
Article Summary: Messi arrived in hyderabad at around 5.40 pm, following a difficult opening leg of his three-day, four-city goat india tour 2025. Telangana chief minister a revanth reddy received him at the taj falaknuma palace before the argentine headed to the rajiv gandhi international stadium.

Article Title: Roars and leaps! Vaibhav Suryavanshi fails to fire; Pakistan go wild in celebration - WATCH
Article Text:
Vaibhav Suryavanshi (ACC Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Why the cricket maidaans of Mumbai are dying | Bombay Sport Exchange with Nadim Memon

Pakistan U19 (Playing XI):

India U19 (Playing XI):

NEW DELHI: Pakistan drew first blood in the high-voltage ACC Men‚Äôs U19 Asia Cup 2025 clash against India as pacer Mohammad Sayyam produced an early breakthrough to dismiss the in-form Vaibhav Suryavanshi for just five runs at the ICC Academy Ground in Dubai.There was wild celebration from the Pakistan camp as Sayyam struck with a decisive delivery to remove India‚Äôs most dangerous batter cheaply.The Pakistan dugout rose to its feet and applauded as Suryavanshi, who had tormented bowlers in the previous match, was sent back early.Sayyam bowled a probing delivery that Suryavanshi failed to judge properly, resulting in a simple catch to the bowler in his follow-through.After completing the catch, Sayyam threw the ball into the air and leapt in celebration, with his teammates rushing in to hug him as Pakistan celebrated a massive early success against their arch-rivals.Earlier, Pakistan captain Farhan Yousaf won the toss and opted to bowl first. The much-anticipated India U19 vs Pakistan U19 contest was reduced to 49 overs per side after rain delayed the start of play.Watch the video here India, led by Ayush Mhatre, entered the match brimming with confidence after registering a commanding 234-run victory over UAE in their tournament opener on December 12.Suryavanshi had been the standout performer in that match, earning the Player of the Match award for his sensational 171 off 95 balls, an innings that featured nine fours and 14 sixes. His knock powered India to a mammoth 433 for 6, before UAE were restricted to 199 for 7.Pakistan U19, meanwhile, also came into the contest on the back of a dominant opening win. They thrashed Malaysia U19 by 297 runs, with Sameer Minhas producing a superb unbeaten 177 off 148 deliveries, including 11 fours and eight sixes, to earn the Player of the Match honour.Minhas‚Äô innings helped Pakistan post 345 for 3, after which Malaysia were skittled out for just 48 runs, with Mohammad Sayyam and Ali Raza picking up three wickets apiece, underlining Pakistan‚Äôs bowling firepower ahead of the India clash.Usman Khan, Sameer Minhas, Ali Hassan Baloch, Ahmed Hussain, Farhan Yousaf(captain), Hamza Zahoor(wicketkeeper), Huzaifa Ahsan, Niqab Shafiq, Abdul Subhan, Mohammad Sayyam, Ali Raza.Ayush Mhatre (captain), Vaibhav Suryavanshi, Aaron George, Vihaan Malhotra, Vedant Trivedi, Abhigyan Kundu(wicketkeeper), Kanishk Chouhan, Khilan Patel, Deepesh Devendran, Kishan Kumar Singh, Henil Patel.
Article Summary: Pakistan drew first blood in acc men‚Äôs u19 asia cup 2025 clash against india. Mohammad sayyam produced an early breakthrough to dismiss the in-form vaibhav suryavanshi for just five runs at the icc academy ground in dubai.

Article Title: GOAT India Tour: What Lionel Messi says during Hyderabad visit after Kolkata fiasco
Article Text:
Lionel Messi (PTI Photo)

Fans throw objects, vandalise stadium after Messi leaves early | Hyderabad next

NEW DELHI: Football fans in Hyderabad experienced an unforgettable evening as they witnessed Argentine football legend Lionel Messi at the Rajiv Gandhi International Cricket Stadium on Saturday.The event presented a stark contrast to the chaos that had erupted in Kolkata earlier that day. Messi made his entrance under tight security measures while fans enthusiastically cheered for him.The football icon enhanced the spectators' experience by playing football and kicking some balls into the crowd. Telangana Chief Minister Revanth Reddy was present at the venue to witness the occasion.Chief Minister Reddy participated in an exhibition match, which was part of Messi's GOAT Tour of India. He shared some passes with the football superstar during the event. Congress leader Rahul Gandhi also attended and took photographs with Messi."Thank you very much for all your affection. It's an honour for us to be able to spend these days here in India with you, so I'm truly grateful. Thank you so much," said Messi.Messi was accompanied by his Inter Miami teammates Rodrigo de Paul and Luis Suarez during his visit to India."I'm very happy. This has been a very special night. Thank you so much for your love and affection," said Rodrigo de Paul."Good evening everyone. Thank you for the love. A big hug!" said Luis Suarez.In preparation for Messi's upcoming visit to Mumbai on Sunday, city police are implementing strict security protocols. These measures include prohibiting water bottles, metals, and coins inside stadiums.The authorities are setting up watchtowers to monitor the crowd movements effectively. They are taking additional precautions to prevent any stampede-like situations.These enhanced security measures aim to avoid the chaotic scenes that occurred in Kolkata during Messi's visit on Saturday. At the Salt Lake Stadium, thousands of disappointed fans had protested after they couldn't get a clear view of the football icon despite purchasing expensive tickets.The Mumbai police are determined to ensure a smooth and safe experience for both the visiting football star and his fans. Their comprehensive security plan reflects the lessons learned from the Kolkata incident.
Article Summary: Argentine football legend lionel messi was in hyderabad for an exhibition match. Telangana chief minister revanth reddy was present at the venue to witness the occasion. Congress leader rahul gandhi also attended and took photographs with messi. The football icon enhanced the spectators' experience by playing football.

Article Title: IND vs SA: Time to take fresh guard as Indian batters endure intense drills ahead of 3rd T20I
Article Text:
Abhishek Sharma and Kuldeep Yadav during a training session ahead of the third T20 International cricket match. (Image: PTI)

DHARAMSHALA:

Shivam Mavi opens up on IPL snubs, lonely domestic grind, confidence before auction

By the time the Indian team reached the HPCA stadium on Saturday evening, the temperature here in the hills dropped significantly. As the three and a half-hours long practice session progressed in the chilly weather, the jitters in the Indian camp became more apparent.South Africa‚Äôs all-format tour of India is in its last week. The visitors have managed to bare open India's deficiencies in more ways than one would have expected. Seldom does the Indian team go through a practice session as extensive and intense on a match eve as it did on the eve of Sunday's third T20I. As is the norm with this team, it was officially an optional session. But only Tilak Verma and Arshdeep Singh skipped the session. The South African team, on the other hand, took the day off and went hiking in the hills. They feel they are in a better space with the series locked at 1-1.The T20 team under head coach Gautam Gambhir seemed to be on auto-pilot mode for over a year. However, two months away from the T20 World Cup, glaring problems have surfaced and the edginess is unmistakable. It starts with the struggles of captain Suryakumar Yadav and vice-captain Shubman Gill and spills over to some incomprehensible strategies and selections.Saturday was more about going back to basics. When Washington Sundar was padding up at the top of the nets session, Hardik Pandya approached him and cautioned him: ‚ÄúThis is a pitch where you have to be gutsy.‚Äù The pitch here has historically provided big scores. But one can never discount the amount of movement and bounce the venue offers to the bowlers.The focus of the nets sessions was on polishing every batter‚Äôs technique. Once Sanju Samson and Washington Sundar were done with their batting in the nets, Surya and Gill hogged the attention for the rest of the evening. They hopped all four nets. Surya, in fact, batted for well over 90 minutes‚Äîthat‚Äôs how long an entire team‚Äôs T20 innings lasts. They went through drills that are seen more in academies where one works on the nuances of a solid technique. Gill and Jitesh only joined Pandya for a range-hitting session under lights at the centre square after a thorough session of old-school batting in the nets.Surya, for one, eschewed his trademark pick-up ramps and swipes behind square on the on-side against the pacers. The vertical bat and a compact defence were the order of the day. He did get into a phase where he dealt in sweeping and lapping the spinners. As he started to get beaten frequently, he switched to playing down the ground and practicing the inside-out shots over cover.Surya is the designated No. 3 in this batting lineup. But Axar Patel coming out to bat at No. 3 in the second over in the previous match must hurt the egos of the frontline batters. Tilak Verma expectedly put it down to the team‚Äôs much-hyped flexibility. ‚ÄúI have told the team that I can bat in any situation. But we want to be flexible. Axar has done a good job for the team in the T20 World Cup. So, one has to be ready for whatever the team needs. But I don‚Äôt mind doing that job,‚Äù Verma said on Saturday.Playing the moving new ball has been a major problem. Gill just stuck to punching the ball off the back foot. His frailties against the new ball pitching on a good length are well documented. The deliveries outside off have begun to catch the outside edge more often. Thus, one saw him working overtime on backfoot punches squarer of the wicket and uppercuts to make use of the field in the powerplay. As Surya retired to the dressing room, Gill hung back for a long and intense chat with Gambhir and assistant coach Ryan ten Doeschate. For one who is obsessed about his batting, Gill must be aware there isn‚Äôt much time for him to iron out the chinks in his batting before the T20 World Cup comes calling in Feb-March.As India grapple to find their absolute T20 game, South Africa seemed to be more in control of where the team is placed right now. ‚ÄúIt might look as if we are slightly unsure given the amount of changes we make every match. But it‚Äôs certainly not for the sake of making changes. We have a pretty good idea of what our World Cup squad will be like. It‚Äôs really about just managing players. There are a few guys that have been here since the test series and then we‚Äôve also got SA20 after this,‚Äù South Africa coach Shukri Conrad said.With this third T20I, one expects the Indian team to take a fresh guard and re-organise their T20 setup as they approach the final phase of preparation for defending their T20 World Cup title.
Article Summary: South africa‚Äôs all-format tour of india is in its last week. The visitors have managed to bare open india's deficiencies in more ways than one would have expected. Seldom does the indian team go through a practice session as extensive and intense on a match eve.

Article Title: Jasprit Bumrah works hard to get yorkers going again
Article Text:
Jasprit Bumrah. (Image: AP)

DHARAMSHALA:

Shivam Mavi opens up on IPL snubs, lonely domestic grind, confidence before auction

Usually on match eves, Jasprit Bumrah prefers to go through the paces. More often than not, he is one of the seniors in the team who chooses to skip these optional sessions. On Saturday evening, though, he turned up at the HPCA stadium, set up his own practice nets on the centre square and went through a rigorous session of bowling, focusing much on getting the yorker right.He didn‚Äôt bowl to any of the batters. It was just Bumrah, a camera stationed right next to where an umpire would be standing, a pair of boots and cones on either side of the crease at the other end, stumps and bowling coach Morne Morkel . For a good 45 minutes, he went full throttle. It was a solo act‚Äîone which will be a masterclass in perfecting yorkers. These drills are usually carried out when one starts out bowling yorkers. In essence, he has gone back to the drawing board.Right from the time he burst on to the scene, Bumrah and toe-crushing yorkers became synonymous. Over a period of time, he has mastered the all-round art of fast bowling so well that he has always been in control of proceedings. Hence, unnerving Bumrah is one of the toughest jobs for opposing teams. Yet, he has managed to identify what has been lacking in bowling.In the second T20I against South Africa in New Chandigarh, Bumrah failed to execute his yorkers. Interestingly, since he resumed his T20I duties in the Asia Cup in Sept after a gap of 14 months, he hasn‚Äôt looked incisive enough. In 12 preceding matches, his economy rate has been under control. He conceded over 11 runs per over twice and only once his economy rate has gone beyond seven. What would be a tad disconcerting is the fact that he has managed to take just 12 oversIt also could be that the opponents have decided to play Bumrah out more cautiously, preserving wickets to target the other bowlers.‚ÄúI think on a night when he‚Äôs off, you've got to take what you can get because I don't know when you're going to get it again. We don‚Äôt plan too much around the matchups. Whatever it allows us on the night. If the batters are in, we obviously want to take on the aggressive options,‚Äù South Africa coach Shukri Conrad replied to a query on how they prepare for Bumrah.‚ÄúI‚Äôm sure he‚Äôll be back to his best again tomorrow night or maybe later in the series we hope. You have to factor in the conditions. Maybe the ball was a little bit wet side,‚Äù he added, choosing his words very carefully, probably not wanting to poke the bear.Bumrah, by his own lofty standards, would know he hasn‚Äôt been able to make an impact as consistently as he was used to. Conditions or not, the assault carried out on him by the South African batters two days ago must have stirred him up.
Article Summary: In the second t20i against south africa in new chandigarh, jasprit bumrah failed to execute his yorkers. Since he resumed his t 20i duties in the asia cup in sept after a gap of 14 months, he hasn‚Äôt looked incisive enough.

Article Title: Lionel Messi GOAT India Tour 2025: Complete Mumbai itinerary, timings and full schedule
Article Text:
Lionel Mess (Getty Images)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Fans throw objects, vandalise stadium after Messi leaves early | Hyderabad next

Lionel Messi GOAT India Tour 2025 ‚Äì Mumbai Schedule & Itinerary



4:30 PM | Cricket Club of India (CCI)

5:00 PM | Wankhede Stadium

Ceremonial kick-off

Post-match | Private venue (Closed-door event)

Tour companions

NEW DELHI: Lionel Messi ‚Äôs GOAT India Tour 2025 moves to Mumbai on Sunday after its earlier stops in Kolkata and Hyderabad, with a packed schedule that includes a padel exhibition at the Cricket Club of India, an exhibition football match at the Wankhede Stadium, and a private charity fashion show featuring memorabilia from Argentina‚Äôs 2022 FIFA World Cup triumph.The tour‚Äôs Kolkata leg was mired in controversy following allegations of organisational lapses. In contrast, the Hyderabad event saw Messi take part in an exhibition match attended by Telangana Chief Minister Revanth Reddy and Congress leader Rahul Gandhi, both of whom posed for photographs with the Inter Miami superstar.The Mumbai itinerary begins with a padel exhibition at the Cricket Club of India around 4.30 pm, an event expected to attract several high-profile guests, including Shah Rukh Khan and cricket legend Sachin Tendulkar.The focus will then shift to the Wankhede Stadium at 5 pm for the main GOAT India Tour programme. The evening will feature a ceremonial kick-off followed by a seven-a-side exhibition match, with Bollywood celebrities set to take part.Messi is also scheduled to step onto the field at Wankhede to greet fans during the event.The Mumbai leg will conclude with a closed-door charity fashion show and auction, showcasing prized memorabilia from Argentina‚Äôs victorious 2022 World Cup campaign.Several Bollywood stars, including Jackie Shroff, John Abraham and Kareena Kapoor Khan, are expected to attend the charity event.As per the full Day 2 schedule, the padel match at the Cricket Club of India will begin at 4.30 pm, followed by the GOAT Cup exhibition match at Wankhede Stadium at 5 pm in a seven-versus-seven format featuring Bollywood celebrities, before the tour wraps up with the private fashion show and memorabilia auction.Padel exhibition matchHigh-profile guests expected, including Shah Rukh Khan and Sachin TendulkarMain GOAT India Tour programme beginsSeven-a-side exhibition football match featuring Bollywood celebritiesLionel Messi to make an on-field appearance to greet fansCharity fashion showAuction of memorabilia from Argentina‚Äôs 2022 FIFA World Cup triumphExpected attendees include Jackie Shroff, John Abraham and Kareena Kapoor KhanMessi accompanied during the Mumbai leg by key figures from the tour, with prominent sports and entertainment personalities in attendance
Article Summary: Messi‚Äôs goat india tour 2025 moves to mumbai on sunday after stops in kolkata and hyderabad. Mumbai itinerary includes a padel exhibition at the cricket club of india, an exhibition football match at the wankhede stadium, and a private charity fashion show.

Article Title: ‚ÄòLegend like Lionel Messi deserved better‚Äô: Former India cricketer loses cool after Kolkata ruckus
Article Text:
Broken chairs strewn amid chaos during an event of Argentine footballer Lionel Messi as part of his 'G.O.A.T. India Tour 2025', at Vivekananda Yuba Bharati Krirangan (VYBK), in Kolkata. (PTI Photo/Swapan Mahapatra)

Fans throw objects, vandalise stadium after Messi leaves early | Hyderabad next

Former India cricketer Manoj Tiwari launched a scathing attack on the organisers and authorities after chaos marred Lionel Messi‚Äôs much-hyped appearance at Salt Lake Stadium on Saturday, saying a global icon like the Argentine superstar ‚Äúdeserved better‚Äù.‚ÄúI am speechless of what happened today in my city! This is shambolic! Me, being an international sportsperson can feel how embarrassing it was for Messi today. We all love him and the craze was well anticipated! Organizer Satadru has already been arrested and I thank the police department for the prompt action. The way Satadru played with the hard-earned money and emotion of the football-loving people of Bengal today at the Salt Lake Stadium, deserves an alarming punishment. .. Another case of False promise and complete mismanagement by Satadru! Thankfully I was not present today... I always had doubt if he had the credibility of pulling off an event like this in Kolkata. A legend like Leo Messi deserved better. I am sure the Government will take strict action against Satadru and management.. Kolkata didn't deserve this!‚Äù Tiwari wrote on X.Messi‚Äôs much-anticipated visit lasted just 22 minutes, enough to turn what was billed as a historic celebration into a spectacle of mismanagement.More than 50,000 fans, many of whom paid between Rs 4,000 and Rs 12,000, and even higher in the black market, were left frustrated after failing to get a clear glimpse of the World Cup winner.The situation deteriorated rapidly as Messi was surrounded by politicians, VVIPs and security personnel, effectively blocking the view of the paying public.Despite repeated appeals from promoter Satadru Dutta over the public address system to clear the ground, the crowding worsened, forcing Messi‚Äôs early exit.Angry fans reacted by throwing bottles and chairs, vandalising canopies and damaging stadium property, prompting police intervention.The unrest lasted over an hour, though police largely showed restraint to prevent a stampede.Messi‚Äôs second visit to Kolkata, part of his India tour, was meant to inspire football lovers. Instead, it exposed glaring gaps in planning and crowd control, leaving behind disappointment, damage and serious questions about governance and accountability.
Article Summary: Messi‚Äôs second visit to kolkata, part of his india tour, was meant to inspire football lovers. Instead, it exposed glaring gaps in planning and crowd control. Former india cricketer manoj tiwari launched a scathing attack on the organisers and authorities.

Article Title: GOAT India Tour: Lionel Messi meets Rahul Gandhi; presents signed Argentina jersey
Article Text:
Photo/screengrab

Fans throw objects, vandalise stadium after Messi leaves early | Hyderabad next

NEW DELHI: Congress leader Rahul Gandhi met Argentine footballer Lionel Messi in Hyderabad on Saturday during the second leg of the GOAT India Tour of Argentininan football greay.Messi presented a signed jersey to the Congress MP, and the two spoke briefly at the Rajiv Gandhi Indoor Stadium.Addressing fans in Hyderabad, Messi said, "for the love I've received today and always".Telangana chief minister A Revanth Reddy was also present at the venue and, before Gandhi arrived, spent some time with Messi on the ground, where they were seen casually kicking a football.Messi reached Hyderabad on Saturday evening, a few hours after disorder marked the opening leg of his India tour in Kolkata.Around 50,000 spectators at the Salt Lake Stadium in Kolkata, many of whom paid between Rs 4,000 and Rs 12,000 ‚Äî and in some cases up to Rs 20,000 in the black market ‚Äî were left upset as politicians, VVIPs, security personnel and others surrounded Messi, leaving fans unable to get a clear view.The situation escalated when angry spectators threw bottles, which are banned inside sports venues. Questions were raised over how such items, including food packets, were allowed into the stadium. Chairs were later pulled out and thrown.Fibreglass seats were found damaged across the field and the synthetic track.
Article Summary: Congress leader rahul gandhi met argentine footballer lionel messi in hyderabad. Messi presented a signed jersey to the congress mp, and the two spoke briefly at the rajiv gandhi indoor stadium. Telangana chief minister a revanth reddy was also present at the venue and, before gandhi arrived, spent some time with messi on the ground.

Article Title: John Cena shocks WWE officials after emotional off-script moment during chaotic live Netflix broadcast
Article Text: Wrestling icon John Cena surprised WWE officials and fans by going off-script during a Netflix broadcast, presenting a handwritten tribute to rival AJ Styles. Cena later apologized, admitting he acted alone without approval, emphasizing his respect for the company's creative process. This unexpected moment highlights his emotional retirement tour as he nears his final match.
Article Summary: Wrestling icon john cena surprised wwe officials and fans by going off-script during a netflix broadcast. Cena later apologized, admitting he acted alone without approval, emphasizing his respect for the company's creative process. This unexpected moment highlights his emotional retirement tour as he nears his final match.

Article Title: Shah Rukh Khan and AbRam meet Lionel Messi as fans erupt in cheers - WATCH
Article Text:
Shah Rukh Khan, son AbRam greet Lionel Messi (Image credit: Agencies)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Fans throw objects, vandalise stadium after Messi leaves early | Hyderabad next

NEW DELHI: Football icon Lionel Messi virtually unveiled his 70-foot statue at the Sree Bhumi Sporting Club in Lake Town, Kolkata, on Saturday as part of his GOAT India Tour 2025. The event was attended by Bollywood superstar Shah Rukh Khan and Uruguayan footballer Luis Su√°rez, drawing massive crowds of fans to the area.The ceremony marked a special moment for football fans in Kolkata, blending sport and entertainment as global icons came together. A video of the unveiling, showing the interaction between Messi, Shah Rukh Khan and AbRam, was later shared by PTI on X.The towering iron statue, which depicts Messi holding the FIFA World Cup trophy, has been installed at the Sree Bhumi Sporting Club in Lake Town, South Dum Dum, as a tribute to the Argentine legend.Watch the video here Shah Rukh Khan arrived at the venue with his youngest son AbRam Khan, with both posing for photographs alongside Messi. The actor was seen wearing a grey hoodie, muted-coloured pants and a black cap, while carrying a backpack. AbRam was dressed in a black tracksuit.West Bengal Minister and Sree Bhumi Sporting Club President Sujit Bose said, "Lionel Messi and his team are happy with the statue installed in Lake Town."
Article Summary: Lionel messi virtually unveiled his 70-foot statue at the sree bhumi sporting club in lake town, kolkata. The event was attended by bollywood superstar shah rukh khan and uruguayan footballer luis su√°rez. The towering iron statue depicts messi holding the fifa world cup trophy.
